Initializer# init(affineTransform:)

iOS 16.0+iPadOS 16.0+macOS 13.0+watchOS 9.0+tvOS 16.0+

```
init(affineTransform: AffineTransform3D)
```

## [See Also](/documentation/simd/simd_float4x3/init(affineTransform:)#see-also)

### [Initializers](/documentation/simd/simd_float4x3/init(affineTransform:)#Initializers)

[`init()`](/documentation/simd/simd_float4x3/init())Creates a new matrix with uninitialized memory.[`init(Float)`](/documentation/simd/simd_float4x3/init(_:)-4h0e8)Creates a new matrix with the specified scalar value on the main diagonal.[`init(diagonal: SIMD3<Float>)`](/documentation/simd/simd_float4x3/init(diagonal:))Creates a new matrix with the specified vector on the main diagonal.[`init([SIMD3<Float>])`](/documentation/simd/simd_float4x3/init(_:)-50uqp)Creates a new matrix from an array.[`init(SIMD3<Float>, SIMD3<Float>, SIMD3<Float>, SIMD3<Float>)`](/documentation/simd/simd_float4x3/init(_:_:_:_:))Creates a new matrix with the specified vectors as columns.[`init(columns: (simd_float3, simd_float3, simd_float3, simd_float3))`](/documentation/simd/simd_float4x3/init(columns:))Creates a new matrix with the specified columns.[`init(rows: [SIMD4<Float>])`](/documentation/simd/simd_float4x3/init(rows:))Creates a new matrix with the specified rows.[`init(AffineTransform3D)`](/documentation/simd/simd_float4x3/init(_:)-3rlc3)
